Switch to build team to fix

The workaround is to deploy designer.ui.preview.web as folder in M3 build.

Re-assign to designer team to update the code for deploy it as jar.
The issue if fixed in latest code. Please change back to deploy it as jar in build script.

Rollback the workaround in M3.

set fixed.
